class_description:
This class provides access to the type information determined
 by ValidatorHandler. Some schema languages, such as W3C XML Schema, encourages a validator
 to report the "type" it assigns to each attribute/element.
 Those applications who wish to access this type information can invoke
 methods defined on this "interface" to access such type information. Implementation of this "interface" can be obtained through the
 ValidatorHandler#getTypeInfoProvider() method.
